passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(24) > section > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(25) > footer > section > div > div:nth-child(1) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(25) > footer > section > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(25) > footer > section > div > div:nth-child(3) > h6:nth-child(1)
